programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South Africa Ep11
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Sub Sahara Ep12
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Devon Island - Land of Ice Ep2
programme.desc: Devon Island is the largest uninhabited island in the world. It’s so remote and forbidding that when scientists wanted to simulate living conditions on Mars, they chose Devon. Devon’s barren landscape only supports the hardiest of plants and few animals.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Emu Ep2

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Out of the Darkness Ep1
programme.desc: Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Pockets - Pat-Pat wants to play detective for the day with Noddy, but the only problem is that they don't have a case to solve... that is until the Pockets go missing. Where can they be? It's up to Noddy and Pat Pat to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Cabbage Monster - When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs Not Listening - Noddy's excitedly looking forward to his first ever go at driving Train. But then Revs starts playing up and won't listen when Noddy asks him to stop. Why is Revs not listening to him? A puzzled Noddy investigates to find out what's wrong with his friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie'S A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed… will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep3
programme.desc: Dodgems - Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep1
programme.desc: Fang Decay / Scare Day - Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep8
programme.desc: Tortools - The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... In Color - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep8
programme.desc: Wrinkly Humans People / Piggy Piggy - Tip doesn't think her grandparents will approve of Oh so he disguises himself as a humans housekeeper/Sharzod adopts Pig and names him “Juicy Booty.”

programme.desc: Eye'Ll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Space Rocket - Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Smartysaurus'S Jet Pack - Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Topsy Turvy Trees - All is set for the Toy Green Picnic until Noddy finds some of the trees turned upside down! Was it the Ninjas climbing on them? Or the Pirates wanting an upside-down tree for Pirate Bay? Noddy launches an investigation to find out who's behind all this.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of The Golden Thing - The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Fin-ale - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Blue's Big Dance Party - Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep825
programme.desc: Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball! / Skye and Rory Flip It / Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel / Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat - Rubble & Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. // Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold. // Marshall & Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel.// Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups Save a Class Pet - Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington And The Metal Detector - Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Puppy Girl and Super Pup! - When supervillain Felina Meow starts turning all the dogs at the annual Dog Show into cats, it's up to superheroes Puppy Girl and Super Pup to stop her! Will they foil her cat-astrophic plan before she turns everyone's pups into kitties?!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Sleepwell! - All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep620
programme.desc: The Solar Light Spectacular! - When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Marvelous Moustaches - Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel/Bobbi's Bongos - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would! // Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Lights Camera Action - The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Puppy Girl and Super Pup! - When supervillain Felina Meow starts turning all the dogs at the annual Dog Show into cats, it's up to superheroes Puppy Girl and Super Pup to stop her! Will they foil her cat-astrophic plan before she turns everyone's pups into kitties?!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Sleepwell! - All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep620
programme.desc: The Solar Light Spectacular! - When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Fin-ale - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Guppy Style! - The Guppies hit the road to see a concert by Stylee, a singing sensation known for her fabulous styles!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Good Steel bad Steel - What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Vegetables - Kit and Pup are gardening, but when Kit sees that Pup's freshly dug vegetables are bigger than hers, she is determined to find her own giant one.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Whale - Dee encourages a friend to say 'whale' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We meet lots of different whales. We see swimming whales, splashing whales and even a singing whale!

programme.desc: Close the Gate - The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.desc: Star Flower - Small Clanger is fishing in the music boat and catches a beautiful silver seed. Mother and Tiny help him to plant it and it grows into a very shy little plant.

programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics. They eagerly want to know the ending, but the comic was discontinued. Luckily Duggee has the comic badge!

programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell. But what is a sense? Time for the Squirrels to learn about the five senses and earn their Senses Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep36
programme.desc: The Diplomacy Badge - Betty and Sargent Ant just want perfection, but no one seems to be listening to their shouting! They need a lesson in diplomacy to learn how to speak in a more sensitive way.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Vegetables - Kit and Pup are gardening, but when Kit sees that Pup's freshly dug vegetables are bigger than hers, she is determined to find her own giant one.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Whale - Dee encourages a friend to say 'whale' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We meet lots of different whales. We see swimming whales, splashing whales and even a singing whale!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Close the Gate - The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Star Flower - Small Clanger is fishing in the music boat and catches a beautiful silver seed. Mother and Tiny help him to plant it and it grows into a very shy little plant.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: The Thing That Was At the End of The World - Gwen and Bob embark on an epic trek to find what is at the end of the world.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: Get On Track - Mayor Sho-Po would like the team to build a shortcut through the Po Forest... without taking away any trees!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: You're Never Too Old - Monty is picked on at school for keeping his cuddly toys, and thinks he may be too old for them. This leads him to think about whether people can ever be too old to play.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep63
programme.desc: Fun With Clouds - A family trip for Monty is ruined by the cloudy weather, and they all wish they would disappear, until Monty and Jimmy take another approach.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep64
programme.desc: Car Trip - Monty is surprised that his mum doesn't find her job exciting, and wonders if things become dull if you do them every day.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: But I Am Completely Hearing And Also Listening - Lola thinks that she's very good at listening. However, she has a very bad listening day which leads to all sorts of problems at home and at school.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Frozen - The pond has frozen over so Nelly and Nora help the ducks find the water again.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: Sunset Picnic - Nelly and Nora want to enjoy a sunset picnic, but the annoying midges just won't leave them alone.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: Perimeter Pals - Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep7
programme.desc: Happy Hiro - Thomas sees that Hiro is unhappy so Thomas asks Charlie to tell Hiro a joke, but even Charlie's joke is not enough to make Hiro smile. Later, Thomas meets Hiro at the Search and Rescue Centre, still looking sad.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Dog Loves Biscuits - Dog and Pug meet the biscuit factory owner, who shows them round his factory. One of his workers turns out to be a cat who makes fishy dog biscuits.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep37
programme.desc: The Buddy Badge - Duggee hosts a Buddy Bonanza for Mrs Weaver and the Squirrels, with the aim of finding new buddies with common interests to them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep38
programme.desc: The Bridge Badge - It's bridge building time... the squirrels help a quarrelling group of Gerbils sort out their longstanding disagreement.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep40
programme.desc: The Training Badge - Duggee struggles to organise the Squirrels in order of height and keeping them focused on the task. Sounds like the Squirrels need some training to improve their concentration.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: The Northern Lights, Finland - Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitch's Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Amazon Rain Forest, South America - Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Dead Sea, Middle East - The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Izaac's Lancashire Chorley Cakes - Izaac is making Chorley cakes, a traditional cake recipe from Lancashire. He creates his own pastry circles, which are then filled with a fruity filling of dried cherries and currants.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: Andy and the Grizzly Bear - When some new grizzly bears arrive at the park during a hot summer, it's up to Andy to make sure they have everything they need to help them get rid of their winter coats.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep26
programme.desc: Time Capsule Treasure Chest - Captain Captain tries to collect pieces of treasure that have been left around the place. She orders Cook and Line to take the treasure and lock it away in her treasure chest.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S5) Ep1
programme.desc: Sinker's Message - Gemma is expecting Captain Sinker back from her holidays.

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Chaper Loses His Bounce - Champer is determined to bounce higher than any Numtum has ever bounced before, until he loses his bounce!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering - The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Box Smusher / Tie-Dye Eye - When multiple packages are found smushed, the Middlemost Post must discover the truth and clear their name. // Parker wakes up one morning with Tie-Dye Eye, and pretty soon, so does the entire mountain.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep140
programme.desc: The Monster Who Came to Bikini Bottom / Welcome to the Bikini Bottom Triangle - A monster terrorizes Bikini Bottom until Patrick befriends the huge creature. // SpongeBob and all the Bikini Bottom citizens disappear to an underwater resort.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep141
programme.desc: The Curse of the Hex / The Main Drain - Madame Hagfish puts a hex on the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick search for a legendary drain on the ocean floor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep203
programme.desc: Pineapple Invasion - When SpongeBob hides the secret formula in his home, it's up to Gary to protect it from Plankton.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Jellyfish Kid - A young SpongeBob is determined to catch his first jellyfish, so his friends do whatever they can to help him.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Smurf-Fu / Diaper Daddy - When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a giant snake, the other Smurfs ask her to teach them "Smurf-Fu." // When everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy decides to invent a robot that will do the job.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Who Nose? / Clumsy Not Clumsy - Hefty casts a spell which accidentally turns him into a colossal nose that sucks up everything in its path! // After catching Clumsy, Gargamel tempts him with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep199
programme.desc: Sold! / Lame and Fortune - When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward’s delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep117
programme.desc: Shuffle Boarding / Professor Squidward - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy are booked to attend a shuffleboarding tournament, but they can't go. // When Squidward is mistaken for his famous rival, Squilliam Fancyson, he is invited to teach a class at the most prestigious music school.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Rock-a-Bye Besty / Shake or Break - Best is too anxious to sleep, but Bester knows what to do. He needs to count sheep! Or count one sheep to be exact. // The twins help Flip Flop with her milkshake deliveries, but find one very difficult customer impossible to satisfy.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101
programme.desc: First Delivery / Chore or Less - While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Flight Plan - Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Señor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Tiny Toddler / Magical Beefery Tour - After misplacing the shrink ray Captain Man & Kid Danger have to battle The Toddler to win it back. // When Captain Man & Kid Danger find a golden pickle in their burger they win a private tour of the secretive factory where Beefo's Burgers are made.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Snooze Pods / Sticky Vicky - Jasper becomes trapped in a dream using one of Schwoz's Snooze Pods. It's up to Captain Man & Kid Danger to bring him back. // Henry's field trip to the Museum of Celebrity Garbage is cut short by the arrival of Sticky Vicky.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep61
programme.desc: Fear of a Krabby Patty / Shell of a Man - With the Krusty Krab's new "open 24 hours" policy, the employees must work 'round the clock. // Mr. Krabs loses his shell right before a big reunion with his old buddies.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep62
programme.desc: The Lost Mattress / Krabs vs Plankton - Spongebob buys Mr. Krabs a new mattress to help him sleep better. // Plankton slips and falls on some water at the Krusty Krab and sues Mr. Krabs for not posting a wet floor sign.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep63
programme.desc: Have You Seen This Snail? - While trying to beat a world record, SpongeBob forgets to feed Gary - for several weeks. So Gary runs away to downtown Bikini Bottom where he is taken in by a kind old woman.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep64
programme.desc: Good Neighbors / Skill Crane - Squidward's lazy Sunday is constantly interrupted by Spongebob and Patrick's Good Neighbor Club activities. // Squidward becomes obsessed with winning a prize from the Skill Crane.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy / The Crush - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class. // Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Best in Shoe / Royal Pain - To land the lead role in a play, Alvin wagers Brittany that he can remain in character as a shoe cobbler. // When Brittany becomes convinced she's a long lost princess she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Catch a Code / Stripe Hype - Ferris builds a robot for the school science fair but an accidently throws its sequence code out of order. // Corn and Peg welcome newcomer, Abraham, to Galloping Grove by showing him around town and making him feel welcome in his new community.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Forever Home / Broken Telephone - Corn and Peg set out to find a 'forever' home for each and every animal at the Galloping Grove Animal Shelter. // When the telephones aren't working, Corn and Peg help deliver messages for Ms Sassy.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stank Breath / Frog Day Afternoon - Buhdeuce has to deal with some awesomely bad stank breath that leads to some awesomely bad trouble. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce teach their pet Jelly how to fetch, and she accidentally fetches a monster egg.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep105
programme.desc: My Sharon-Ah - Brendar faces off against a Royal Order rival, but the result casts doubt about her ability to complete her ultimate quest.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dorg Goes to Adventure Club / Dorg Wants a Scare - When Dorg accidentally shrinks his sister's Adventure Club sash, he must replace the badges. // Dorg wants a good scare, so Patronella fills his house with all the gang's secret fears. Dorg finds out he's more scare-able than he thought!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Mythic Mounties / Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Cupid - The friends join a scouting group but Felicity has a hard time winning the praise of her scoutmaster. // When Moona announces she's closing Mythic Malts, Felicity tries to get Moona to fall back in love with her job, but the plan backfires.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Dolled Up / Space Race - Things spiral out of control when Sanjay goes to ridiculous lengths to conceal that he and Craig were using Darlene’s makeup kit. // Sanjay takes credit for Craig’s invention, but ends up almost losing his best friend.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Cold War / Fanboy in the Plastic Bubble - Fanboy and Chum Chum catch a cold and they don't just get sick, they get sick of each other. // Fanboy and Chum Chum buy Boog's childhood plastic bubble and have the time of their lives.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Kid Stuff / Super Duper Crime Busters - T.U.F.F. agents are not allowed to use their blasters in front of children. Snaptrap uses this rule to his own advantage. // A documentary-style TV show spends a day profiling T.U.F.F. and its super-star agents.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Rusty's Bit In The Woods / Rusty's Stuffy Toughy - When Crush wanders off and gets lost, Rusty invents a night flyer to find him in the dark. // When Liam loses his stuffy out the train window, Rusty goes on a retrieval mission using a mechanical spider suit to climb up under the trestle to get it.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Hair Flair Fuzzly / The Fuzzlies in the Attic - Mrs. Melvin's hairbrush goes missing, and Abby tracks it to a brand new Fuzzly who loves to style hair. // When the Fuzzly twins, Mo and Bo, get separated in the hotel, it's up to Abby to get them back together again.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Metalhead Rewired - When Donnie upgrades Metalhead's artificial intelligence, he must decide if he can trust a sentient Metalhead or if he has created a new foe.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep22
programme.desc: Something Smells / Bossy Boots - SpongeBob eats sea onion ice cream and his breath stinks. When people avoid him, Pat convinces him that it's because he's ugly. // When Mr. Krabs gives his daughter Pearl a job at the Krusty krab, she starts to make some changes.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Jinxed! - After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cloud of the Month / A. Plumber - After receiving the Middlemost Post's 'Cloud of the Month' award, Parker gets a big head about the new title. // After clogging the toilet, Parker calls a plumber-that winds up being Ryan in disguise-to fix the problem.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep115
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Mail Off - Parker learns that the mail Drone the cloud accidentally destroyed has come back for revenge. Parker, Lily, and Mayor Peeve team up to stop the zombie mail Drone once and for all.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep246
programme.desc: Plankton's Old Chum / Stormy Weather - Where Plankton usually dumps his rotten chum is too full, so he tricks SpongeBob into hiding it around the city. // SpongeBob befriends a small storm cloud, but has to protect it from a crazed weather man.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep101

programme.title: Roger Ep117/Ep118/Ep103/Ep104/Ep129/Ep122/Ep123/Ep124
programme.desc: The Visitors/The Cabin/The Big Test/The Joystick/A Lovely Disintegrator/No Limits/Daddy's Vase/The Kite - Roger tends to rush to conclusions. After a misunderstanding, in order to make Fatou happy, our alien brings two retired tourists to Kooh-Los island. But just as quickly, he mistakes their intentions and decides they are a danger to the island. With Fatou’s help, he is going to elaborate a bunch of plans to get them to leave. And in the end, he understands that the couple, even though a bit invasive, are only full of the best intentions in the world.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.
